  <title>ws</title>
  <abstract>The LAGOS-LOCUS-v1 WS dataset contains the Lake Watersheds (WS, watersheds excluding flow into upstream lakes greater than 10 ha) delineations for each lake included in the LAke multi-scaled GeOSpatial and temporal database (LAGOS-US). Only the shape (GIS) information for the Lake Watersheds and their identifiers are contained in this dataset--all other watershed attributes are published as separate components of LAGOS-US. These watersheds were custom-delineated for LAGOS-US, relying on the USGS National Hydrography Dataset and the USGS 3DEP elevation datasets as inputs.

To provide LAGOS-US users with a spatial representation of the Lake Watersheds (WS, watersheds excluding flow into upstream lakes greater than 10 ha) in the LAGOS-US database.</abstract>
